title: My Pixel 2 can't open gmail even in safe mode.
content: My Pixel 2 (running Android 11, and with all apps up to date) just started crashing when I open gmail (and a couple other apps).  So I rebooted to safe mode, to disable all 3rd party apps, and gmail is still crashing.  Digital assistant is also not working.  I have plenty of storage left (58% used, 26GB free).  No idea how to fix it or what is going on.  Please help!  Not a techy here...
